message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation is affecting you more than me.
Bob, the clock is ticking, and this is a pretty good deal for you. Take it or leave it.
Time is on my side, and inflation is not your friend. Take this offer before it gets worse.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it down the middle and call it a day.
You should have taken one of my previous offers. Inflation is really hurting your share now.
